Reviewing Revision Properties

By working with the History list, you can review the properties of folder and item revisions.

To review item revision properties:

  1. Select a folder from the folder hierarchy.

  2. Click a component tab.

  3. Select an item from the upper pane.

  4. Select the History tab from the lower pane.

  5. Right-click a revision in the History list. The History context menu opens.

  6. Click Properties. The appropriate Properties dialog opens.

To review folder revision properties:

  1. Select a folder from the folder hierarchy.

  2. Select Properties from the Folder or context menu.

  3. Select the History tab. (If you do not have access rights to the folder history, you will not be able to view this tab.)

  4. Right-click a revision in the History list. The History context menu opens.

  5. Click Properties. The appropriate Properties dialog opens. It does not display the Exclude and Files tabs.
